scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && concurrent -r "npm run less" "npm run build:ts" && npm run cordova
scripts.build:ts: tsconfig && npm run ts && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdirp app/dist && browserify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v
scripts.copy: mkdirp cordova/www && concurrent -r "npm run copy:dist" "npm run copy:fonts" "npm run copy:images" "npm run copy:index"
scripts.cordova: npm run copy && plat cordova prepare && plat cordova build
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && mkdirp deploy && npm run deploy:clean && npm run deploy:mkdir && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build -- -- -- -p [minifyify --no-map]
scripts.deploy:copy: concurrent -r -k "ncp app/index.html deploy/index.html" "ncp app/config.json deploy/config.json" "ncp app/favicon.ico deploy/favicon.ico" "ncp app/dist deploy/dist" "ncp app/fonts deploy/fonts" "ncp app/images deploy/images" "ncp app/lib deploy/lib" "ncp node_modules/platypusui/dist/fonts deploy/node_modules/platypusui/dist/fonts" "ncp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts deploy/node_modules/font-awesome/fonts"
scripts.deploy:mkdir: mkdirp deploy/node_modules && mkdirp deploy/node_modules/platypusui/dist && mkdirp deploy/node_modules/font-awesome
scripts.prepublish: npm run tsd && tsconfig && npm run initialize && npm run build:ts
scripts.watch: concurrent -r -k "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:less" "npm run watch:bundle"
scripts.watch:less: nodemon -q -w app -e less --exec npm run less
